about_the_game:
Yee-Haw!! is a fast-paced roguelite game set in a strange wild west. Survive numerous waves of 30+ different kinds of hostile enemies and avoid random obstacles with the help of various powerups, bombs, weapons and more.

Key features:


  • 18 stats to improve through 40+ powerups;
  • Fusion powerups, where certain combinantion of regular powerups gives you special stats, weapons and skills;
  • Eight different cowboys to choose/unlock, each with a special starting weapon and/or skill;
  • Three maps with specific characteristics, such as environment boundries and obstacles;
  • Simple graphics, with a native resolution of 192x108 pixels, and engaging gameplay;
  • Two CRT-like filters to add to the retro and old school experience;
  • Kill and level counter.

name: Yee-Haw!! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: In this fast-paced roguelite, destroy thousands of enemies with the help of your cowboy and dozens of special powerups and weapons. Yee-Haw!!
